g.text: # Build arguments declared here are in the global scope
# You can't declare environment variables in the global scope
# GLOBAL_ARG was not redeclared in this stage
# FROM-lines belong to the global scope and have access to global ARGs
# Redeclaring GLOBAL_ARG without a value inherits the global default
# ARG here this scope creates a local argument
# Set an environment variable in this scope
# Set an environment variable to the value of a build argument
# Arguments and variables are inherited from parent stages
# You must redeclare pre-defined arguments to use them in a stage
# Pre-defined multi-platform arguments like $BUILDPLATFORM are global
